# Description of DataSchema variable

The description of harmonised variable is the following:

* Short name: `heart_rate`
* Variable label: `Heart rate (bpm)`
* Variable description: `Heart rate of the participant at each wave measured in beats per minute (bpm)`
* Domain: `Physical measures`
* Value type: `continuous`
* Category missings: 

**Code** | **Category Label**
----| ------------------
991 | CAPI/interviewer error
992 | Impute
993 | Disable to measure
994 | Not attempt/not done
995 | Does not answer
996 | Not applicable
997 | Refuse
998 | Do not know
999 | Missing
